2090240.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Japanese School Girls - The Music of Their Stories
2090240.description:
No matter how good a game looks, the music plays a huge part in transporting the mood and the emotions to the players. And if you are making a light-hearted game, perhaps one in a modern setting, the Japanese School Girls - The Music of Their Stories pack is just what you need to communicate the right vibes!

The thirty brand new tracks cover basically any situation you might want to score with matching music. Fitting the theme of the pack, even the more somber tracks are not deeply depressing, but rather soft with slow piano tunes. But those are comparingly rare, as most of the content of this pack is joyful and uplifting!
This pack also comes with twenty short jingles that you can add to highlight certain run-ins, events or the start or certain episodes!

Features:

* 30 BGM and 20 ME
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2090240.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
